tooltip.vrm:death1: Attack have a chance to life steal
tooltip.vrm:death2: [Right-Click] Mark surrounding targets, dealing more damage
tooltip.vrm:death3: [Shift Right-Click] Apply voodoo(all damage will be transferred to target) onto target
tooltip.vrm:death4: [On Hold] Revival on death & dealing target's half max hp as damage to target
tooltip.vrm:war1: Attack have a chance to ignite target
tooltip.vrm:war2: [Right-Click] Gain temporary strength and resistance, additional effect when low on health
tooltip.vrm:war3: [Shift Right-Click] Inflict rage and cause near-by mobs to fight each other
tooltip.vrm:war4: [On Hold] Gain resistance and strength on low health
tooltip.vrm:pes1: Shoot Magical Arrow which causes Plague (will release toxin when target dies)
tooltip.vrm:pes3: [Crouching Shoot] Shoots 3 Magical Arrows but with poor accuracy
tooltip.vrm:pes4: [On Hold] Immune to all Negative potion effects
tooltip.vrm:fam1: Absorbs nearby life force to fill hunger [if holding, absorbs from creatures]
tooltip.vrm:fam2: [On Hold] Make nearby animals crave for lust
tooltip.vrm:fam3: [On Hold] When attacked, have a chance to apply daze onto attacker
tooltip.vrm:fam4: [Shift Right-Click] Sacrifice all hunger for full health
tooltip.vrm:sinmask0: Mask containing the power of a deadly sin
tooltip.vrm:sinmask2: [Right-Click] Copy one of targeted entity's ability
tooltip.vrm:sinmask3: [Right-Click] Causes targeted entity to be in love
tooltip.vrm:sinmask4: [On Wear] Have a chance to drop double the item
tooltip.vrm:sinmask6: [On Wear] Higher the attack combo, better the buff
tooltip.vrm:sinmask7: [On Wear] Apply fear to nearby entity and reflects projectile
tooltip.vrm:sinmask8: [Shift Right-Click] Sacrifice all hunger for full health
message.vrm.sinactivate: You feel a sinister magic flowing through you
message.vrm.sindeactivate: You resists the urge of temptation
message.vrm.cannoteat: I can't seem to stomach this...
config.text.minstruct: Min distance away from chosen spot
config.text.maxstruct: Max distance away from chosen spot
config.text.minsinstruct: Min distance away from chosen spot
config.text.maxsinstruct: Max distance away from chosen spot
config.text.slothmasksleepnight: Sloth Mask allow setting to night when sleep in day
config.text.slothmasksleepday: Sloth Mask allow setting to day when sleep in night
config.text.greedmaskdouble: Greed Mask allowed to double drops
config.text.warsworditem: Item used to get Makharia (War Sword)
config.text.pesbowitem: Item used to get Pestilence's Bow
config.text.deathscytheitem: Item used to get Death Scythe
config.text.faminescaleitem: Item used to get Famine's Scale
config.text.screenheight: Screen Height Offset for sin mask warning text. Use [<] & [>] to change in game
config.text.screenwidth: Screen Width Offset for sin mask warning text. Use [;] & ['] to change in game
